mapper.select: SELECT A.*, from_unixtime((UNIX_TIMESTAMP(A.RENT_DTTM) +(A.BASE_TIME) ) ,'%H:%i') AS baseRentTime FROM ( SELECT REN.USR_SEQ AS usrSeq, USR.USR_DEVICE_ID AS usrDeviceId, USR.USR_DEVICE_TYPE AS usrDeviceType, dg_decrypt('TB_SVC_USR', 'USR_MPN_NO', USR.USR_MPN_NO) AS usrMpnNo, REN.RENT_CLS_CD AS rentClsCd, REN.RENT_DTTM, (SELECT BIKE_NO FROM TB_OPR_BIKE WHERE BIKE_ID = REN.RENT_BIKE_ID) AS bikeNo, CASE WHEN LEFT(CD.ADD_VAL1, 7) = 'PREMIUM' THEN (SELECT ADD_VAL1 FROM TB_SYS_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = 'MSI_022') * 60 ELSE (SELECT ADD_VAL1 FROM TB_SYS_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = 'MSI_011') * 60 END AS BASE_TIME, CASE WHEN LEFT(ADD_VAL1, 7) = 'PREMIUM' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ISPREMIUM, CD.ADD_VAL1, VOU.VOUCHER_STR_DTTM, VOU.VOUCHER_SEQ, REN.RENT_BIKE_ID AS rentBikeID FROM TB_SVC_RENT REN LEFT JOIN TB_SVC_VOUCHER VOU ON REN.VOUCHER_SEQ = VOU.VOUCHER_SEQ AND VOU.VOUCHER_USE_YN = 'Y', TB_SYS_COM_CD CD, TB_SVC_USR USR WHERE 1=1 AND VOU.PAYMENT_CLS_CD = CD.COM_CD AND REN.USR_SEQ = USR.USR_SEQ AND REN.RENT_YN = 'Y' AND USR.USR_CLS_CD <> 'USR_002' AND REN.RENT_END_SMS_SEND_YN != 'Y' )A WHERE 1=1 AND (A.ISPREMIUM = 'Y' AND TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(DATE_ADD(A.RENT_DTTM, INTERVAL (SELECT ADD_VAL1 FROM TB_SYS_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = 'MSI_022') MINUTE), NOW())) <= 600) OR (A.ISPREMIUM != 'Y' AND TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(DATE_ADD(A.RENT_DTTM, INTERVAL (SELECT ADD_VAL1 FROM TB_SYS_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD = 'MSI_011') MINUTE), NOW())) <= 600) ORDER BY A.RENT_DTTM

SELECT RENT_SEQ, USR_SEQ, VOUCHER_SEQ, RENT_STATION_ID, RENT_RACK_ID, RENT_BIKE_ID ,DEVICE.DEVICE_MPN_NO FROM TB_SVC_RENT RENT ,TB_IOT_DEVICE DEVICE WHERE RENT_YN = 'N' AND RENT_SEND_YN = 'N' AND RENT.RENT_BIKE_ID = DEVICE.DEVICE_ID ORDER BY RENT_SEQ ASC
